name: Sniper's Dilema
description:
You're the military's sharpest shooter, with the reputation for being able to make any shot. To try and make you fail, your friends set up a challenge that they deem you'll "miss". You're up for the challenge, but its after you go down to the shooting range do you realize that there's a delay from when you pull the trigger to when the bullet reaches the target!

There's no way to control the delay, and as an added challenge, your friends say that you aren't allowed to follow the moving target.

Can you still make the shot?

The Game

This game was made for the FastJ Game Jam with the theme Delayed..... Reaction using SypherEngine, A 2D Java Game Engine that uses JavaFX as its rendering backend.

Engine : SypherEngine [v0.4.1]

Controls

W, Up Arrow or Click - Shoot
